text: V dushe Yakuba vskolykhnulos' vospominaniye o proshlom, kotoroye svyazalos' v predstavlenii s nastoyashchim, i on skazal svoim synov'yam: "Budet stranno, yesli ya ispolnyu vashu pros'bu i doveryu vam vashego brata. Ved' budet to zhe samoye, chto bylo, kogda ya doveril vam Yusufa, a vy vernulis' i skazali, chto yego s"yel volk. YA polagayus' tol'ko na Allakha i Yemu odnomu doveryayu okhranu syna. On samyy nadozhnyy zashchitnik i milost' Yego velika. On ne lishit menya syna, posle togo kak ya poteryal Yusufa
